issue_description:
# [Docs] Update instructions for MonetDB

## Instructions

1. Go to the `docs/data-integrations/monetdb.mdx` file.

2. At the end of the `Implementation` chapter, add the following content:

```
<Tip>
If you installed MindsDB locally via pip, you need to install all handler dependencies manually. To do so, go to the handler's folder (mindsdb/integrations/handlers/monetdb_handler) and run this command: `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
</Tip>
```

3. Save your changes and create a PR.

## The https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/first-timers-only Label

We are happy to welcome you on board! Please take a look at the rules below for first-time contributors.

1. You can solve only one issue labeled as https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/first-timers-only. After that, please look at other issues labeled as https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/good%20first%20issue, https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/help%20wanted, or https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/integration.

2. Please leave a comment on this issue and wait until you are assigned. Then you can create a PR.

3. After you create your first PR in the MindsDB repository, please sign our CLA to become a MindsDB contributor. You can do that by leaving a comment that contains the following: `I have read the CLA Document and I hereby sign the CLA`

**Thank you for contributing to MindsDB!**

**If you enjoy using MindsDB, we'd be happy if you could show your support by giving us a :star: on GitHub.**

issue_comments.body: I will work on this issue and submit PR later. Can you put me as assignee?

@MichaelDacanay 
You can start working on it.

@MichaelDacanay 
Are you still working on it?
Hi @martyna-mindsdb, yes sorry for the delay. I am still working on it; I will try to make the PR by tomorrow.

Update: hi @martyna-mindsdb, this is my first time contributing from a corporate account and it's currently in internal approvals. I will submit a PR once I get the needed approval, but it might take around a week (people are busy due to the July 4th weekend). Apologies for the inconvenience!

@SAPNILPATEL 
This issue is already assigned to another contributor.
Hi @SAPNILPATEL, yes I’m just awaiting an internal approval at my company. One of the required approvals took PTO until July 11, so unfortunately cannot yet merge the PR.

Hi @MichaelDacanay 
Please sign our CLA by leaving a comment on your PR, so we can merge it.

text_context:
# [Docs] Update instructions for MonetDB

## Instructions

1. Go to the `docs/data-integrations/monetdb.mdx` file.

2. At the end of the `Implementation` chapter, add the following content:

```
<Tip>
If you installed MindsDB locally via pip, you need to install all handler dependencies manually. To do so, go to the handler's folder (mindsdb/integrations/handlers/monetdb_handler) and run this command: `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
</Tip>
```

3. Save your changes and create a PR.

## The https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/first-timers-only Label

We are happy to welcome you on board! Please take a look at the rules below for first-time contributors.

1. You can solve only one issue labeled as https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/first-timers-only. After that, please look at other issues labeled as https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/good%20first%20issue, https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/help%20wanted, or https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/labels/integration.

2. Please leave a comment on this issue and wait until you are assigned. Then you can create a PR.

3. After you create your first PR in the MindsDB repository, please sign our CLA to become a MindsDB contributor. You can do that by leaving a comment that contains the following: `I have read the CLA Document and I hereby sign the CLA`

**Thank you for contributing to MindsDB!**

**If you enjoy using MindsDB, we'd be happy if you could show your support by giving us a :star: on GitHub.**

I will work on this issue and submit PR later. Can you put me as assignee?

@MichaelDacanay 
You can start working on it.

@MichaelDacanay 
Are you still working on it?

Hi @martyna-mindsdb, yes sorry for the delay. I am still working on it; I will try to make the PR by tomorrow.

Update: hi @martyna-mindsdb, this is my first time contributing from a corporate account and it's currently in internal approvals. I will submit a PR once I get the needed approval, but it might take around a week (people are busy due to the July 4th weekend). Apologies for the inconvenience!

or else
@martyna-mindsdb can you please assign me this issue?

This issue is already assigned to another contributor.

Hi @SAPNILPATEL, yes I’m just awaiting an internal approval at my company. One of the required approvals took PTO until July 11, so unfortunately cannot yet merge the PR.

Hi @martyna-mindsdb, just created the PR! https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/pull/6820
